name: Fully automatic shrinking machine (small cylinders)
description:
Full automatic Leak Testing Device
for simultaneuos operating of 2 bottles,
capacity up to 1200 bottles/hour
for domestic cylinders for installation in a
chain conveyor system, consisting of:
- Frame for mounting the test bells and the
pneumatic control;
- 2 x test bell with pneumatic cylinder;
- Pneumatic control;
- 2 x Gas sensor ex-proof version;
- 2 x Evaluating device 230 V, 50 Hz (not ex-proof,
for installation outside the explosion proof area)
- Pneumatic pusher;
- Roller conveyor with railings and end stop,
length 3 m;
Completely coated,
